name: testany-agent-skills
description: Testany 公司的 Agent Skills 集合，提供产品研发流程中的各类专业技能

plugins.name: testany-eng
plugins.description: 研发流程工具集：BRD 访谈、PRD 撰写/审查/自动化、HLD 撰写/审查。命令：/testany-eng:brd-interviewer, /testany-eng:prd-writer, /testany-eng:prd-reviewer, /testany-eng:prd-studio, /testany-eng:hld-writer, /testany-eng:hld-reviewer

plugins.name: testany-llm
plugins.description: AI/LLM 工具集：Skill 创建、Prompt 优化。命令：/testany-llm:skill-creator, /testany-llm:prompt-optimizer

plugins.name: testany-mrkt
plugins.description: 营销内容工具集：自媒体文章创作，支持公众号、知乎、小红书、LinkedIn、Medium、Reddit。命令：/testany-mrkt:media-writer
